val.content:
Education is a key pillar of community giving for both Thomas J Henry and The PM Group. That is why we are proud to announce our 2021 support for this great organization!

“We are happy to support such a great organization that awards $70,000 in scholarships. Supporting them as they re-establish their fundraising efforts after the COVID-19 pandemic seemed like the right thing to do,” stated Thomas J Henry.

“The PM Group and Thomas J Henry have a commitment to education through the SA YES Foundation that supplies 45,000 kids attending Title 1 schools with free school supplies annually. Assisting the Rey Feo Education Foundation adds another layer of support for our educational community in San Antonio, Austin, and Corpus Christi,” added Bob Wills, The PM Group’s CEO & Founder.

It has been said that with great success, comes great responsibility. Thomas J Henry is the largest personal injury attorney firm in Texas and amongst the Top 10 personal injury firms in America. Our agency has been representing Thomas J Henry for 14 years and have seen his firm skyrocket in growth. We’ve also witnessed his Texas-sized heart for charitable giving to local organizations and especially to those in need. 

The PM Group is the largest marketing firm and advertising agency in San Antonio and South Texas. In 2020, we led fundraising efforts to donate over $1,050,000 to area 501c non-profits.

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.content:
April is Child Abuse Prevention Month. As an agency, we felt it was important to choose an organization to feature in Making a Difference in San Antonio that helps not only children suffering from abuse but also women and families. We chose Christy’s Hope as the organization to feature in this special section in the San Antonio Express News. Founded by Christy Prescott, Christy’s Hope is an organization that raises funds specifically donated to the San Antonio Battered Women and Children’s Shelter.

After a tour of the shelter 23 years ago, Christy saw their needs and felt inspired to find a way to create regularly occurring events and campaigns that could educate the community and raise funds at the same time. These funds allow the Battered Women and Children’s Shelter to provide necessary housing services, educational programs, counseling, free legal services, medical assistance, and more. Women are able to stay as long as they feel it is necessary until they are ready to make it on their own. Thanks to the dedication of Christy’s Hope, over the past 23 years, the organization has over $3.9 million dollars for the shelter – money that has provided life-saving services to women and families in San Antonio.

You can read the full article at this link and find out more about Christy’s Hope and how you can donate or become involved in upcoming events on their website.

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

seo.title: Image-4.7.21-Getting-it-Done-in-2021-1024x538 | The PM Group

val.content:
Over the last 6-8 months, The PM Group’s agency clients have experienced some amazing accomplishments! For example, ‘The Freaky Car Show’ we produced at Six Flags Fiesta Texas last October for four weeks led to the park to being #1 in the country for attendance.

Next, as written in a previous post on our site, the San Antonio area IHOP restaurants had 2-consecutive weeks of ALL-TIME record sales in March. ‘Wow!’ is really an understatement when you consider we are still in the dark shadow of the COVID-19 pandemic. 

But this accomplishment is even more rewarding and amazing!

The PM Group created a museum exhibit for the San Antonio Museum of Art (SAMA) called ‘Movie Metal’ that opened in late February and was scheduled to run through April 11, 2021. The exhibit realized RECORD BREAKING attendance, and as a result of SAMA’s success, the exhibit has been now extended until June 20, 2021.

SAMA’s ‘Movie Metal’ exhibit is an action-packed display of metallic heroes and vehicles from some of Hollywood’s most popular movies and TV shows. There are Batmobiles and a DeLorean time machine. You can also see the actual F-1 race car that Tony Stark, aka Iron Man, drove in the IRON MAN 2 movie. You’ll also find Transformers’ ‘Bumblebee’ and ‘Optimus Prime’ towering tall in SAMA’s museum lobby too!

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.content:
Our role in helping our clients meet their performance goals is primarily focused on revenue or attendance growth 95% of the time. Even when it is simply a client’s strategic branding campaign, the desired result ultimately still revolves around the growth of their business.

It is why we exist.

We get it, always have, always will!

So, it comes as no surprise that while The PM Group strives to maximize our client’s growth, we, ourselves, always strive to grow our own business as well. After all, all ships rise equally in a rising tide!

Our own agency growth insures we can continue to reward our employees with great benefits, great compensation and maintain a great work environment to call their home. That is why the average tenure of a PMG staffer exceeds 10+ years with the agency. Historically, even when some of our team members accepted positions with other companies that promised greater prosperity and opportunity—they quickly returned when we had an opening. We created a word to describe those employees… boomerangs! And we’re happy to have them back!

Our company theme for this business year is ‘Getting it Done in 2021.’ But, of course that’s our theme every year, only this year we have a heightened focus given that 2019 and 2020 were two of our best years ever!  We had amazing growth in the first quarter of 2021 and look forward to even more growth for the balance of the year.

Looking to grow your business to even greater heights?  Please contact our President / Chief Operating Officer, Fran Yanity, and let’s get started. We didn’t become the largest marketing firm in San Antonio without the track record of success we have cultivated over the last 33 years.

Success breeds success and The PM Group is ready to get it done in 2021 for your business. 

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.content:
Business has been very tough for many companies, attractions, hotels, restaurants, business organizations, and non-profits this past year. COVID-19 did not discriminate. Sales revenues fell sharply for most and the rebound to 2019 levels has been tough.

 

Very tough, but not impossible!

 

Many of The PM Group’s clients have just completed a record month…as in…the best of all-time type of record month!

 

San Antonio area IHOP Restaurants completed a phenomenal month in March, including their two best sales weeks ever! Congrats are in order to their entire organization, but that’s not the whole story. Since May 1st last year, the San Antonio IHOP franchise group has led the nation in comeback sales across the entire IHOP system.

 

There is one thing that has driven The PM Group to become the top marketing agency in the San Antonio and South Texas region…great results!  When our clients excel at the cash register, we are more than an ad agency, we are an accomplished business development firm.

 

That is why The PM Group has retained most clients for decades. We are now in our 22nd year with IHOP restaurants across the Southwest Region of the United States and we look forward to many more years of service and setting even more sales records!

 

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.
val.excerpt: Business has been very tough for many companies, attractions, hotels, restaurants, business organizations, and non-profits this past year. COVID-19 did not discriminate. Sales revenues fell sharply for most and the rebound to 2019 levels has been tough. Very tough, but not impossible! Many of The PM Group’s clients have just completed a record month…as in…the… Continue reading Sales Records Are Made to Be Broken-Part 1

val.content:
Personal safety is a hot topic these days, particularly in the middle of a pandemic. But, for many, personal safety goes way beyond talk of viruses, masks, hand sanitizer and vaccines.

For some, personal safety is a hard, life-changing decision made for themselves and their children. It’s often a life and death situation for women and children, and even men, caught in a cycle of abuse.

While we hear stories in the news, it became real to me when three women were murdered in our small town last year. The pressures of lock downs, job loss and everyday stressors were too much and three women lost their lives at the hands of an abuser.

That is why I support Safer Path Family Violence Shelter, a safe haven for all those individuals suffering from domestic violence and sexual assault.

From the cashier at a local gas station asking me about restraining orders to keep her safe once her ex gets released from prison to another woman telling me how she overcame and escaped long-term abuse, these are real people with real lives and children who are affected.

Safer Path offers a respite from domestic violence and an array of resources for our community. I am proud to be able to direct those in need to counselors and services at Safer Path. Yet, all great organizations like Safer Path, need our support from people like you and me to make a life-changing difference. That’s why I serve on the Safer Path Board of Directors and our companies donate to important fundraisers like Pulling for Safer Path, Sporting Clay Shoot.

The PM Group and Noisy Trumpet donated $1,400 in gift cards and $1,000 cash for their silent auction at this event to help raise needed funds for these important services. Every donation helps to sustain life-giving services like those at Safer Path.

Won’t you join me in committing time and resources to ending abuse in all its forms?

About Safer Path Family Violence Shelter

Safer Path Family Violence Shelter, formerly known as Atascosa Family Crisis Center, was established as a nonprofit 501 (c)3 in April of 1992 to provide support to the victims of dating violence, family violence, sexual assault and stalking. If you find yourself in one of these situations, we would like to help you gain the strength you need to make changes in your life to get you out of your current situation. We provide 24-hour service to our victims. Learn more at saferpathfvs.org or call 830-569-2001.

About The PM Group

The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

About Noisy Trumpet Digital & PR

Noisy Trumpet is a nationally recognized integrated digital and public relations firm in San Antonio, driven by statistical insights and designed to elevate brands across various marketing channels. With deep expertise in digital, web, social media and public relations, Noisy Trumpet is committed to staying abreast of the latest industry trends in order to identify new and innovative opportunities for clients. Learn more about Noisy Trumpet at noisytrumpet.com.

val.content:
Rudy’s Bar-B-Q has continued their “pink” campaign for the sixth year in support of cancer awareness and research in partnership with UT Health San Antonio. After another successful campaign thanks to the support of our community, Rudy’s was able to raise $117,928.30 for the San Antonio Cancer Council for cancer awareness and research! When patrons made a donation of $5 at checkout, they received a FREE $10 Bar-B-Q voucher for their next visit.

“We are grateful to all of our supportive patrons who contributed to our annual ‘pink’ cancer awareness campaign,” said Jonathan Barker, Director of Community Relations for Rudy’s Bar-B-Q. “As a result of this campaign, we are able to support the San Antonio Cancer Council and their mission to promote cancer awareness and research.”

“Since 2015, Rudy’s ‘Pink’ campaign has partnered with the SA Cancer Council to raise funds for breast cancer research,” said Mary Downey, President of the SA Cancer Council. “Every year, 100 percent of the money raised is donated to the Mays Cancer Center’s breast cancer research program.  The SA Cancer Council is proud of its association with Rudy’s and is deeply thankful for the entire Rudy’s team and their enduring commitment to change the story of cancer.”

Today, a special check presentation took place to celebrate the campaign and pass along the generous funds to the San Antonio Cancer Society.

ABOUT RUDY’S COUNTRY STORE & BAR-B-Q

Founded in 1989, Rudy’s Country Store & Bar-B-Q first opened its doors as a meat market in downtown Leon Springs. 30 years later, Rudy’s has become a staple in San Antonio, Texas for its infamous smoked meats, legendary barbeque sauce and down home hospitality. For more information about Rudy’s Country Store & Bar-B-Q and to find a location near you, please visit: leonspringsbbq.com 

ABOUT SA CANCER COUNCIL

The SA Cancer Council is an all-volunteer, non-profit organization that funds the fight against cancer. Over the past 35 years, we have donated more than $5 million to the patients and research at the Mays Cancer Center, the newly named center at UT Health San Antonio MD Anderson. Direct donations and funds raised at our events involve hundreds of members throughout the greater San Antonio community. As a result, we can provide financial and logistical support to patients in need and fund cutting-edge clinical research to help prevent and eradicate cancer.

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.content:
Under-served youth in our community and across the country have felt the many challenges brought on by the COVID-19 pandemic. Kids today are adapting to online learning, coping with stay-at-home orders which suspended social environments, and they have missed out on classic once-in-a-lifetime high school experiences like their proms and traditional graduations.

Teens are learning to adjust to a new norm.

If the challenges brought on from the pandemic are not hard enough, teens within inner-city communities continue to face adversities present within their own neighborhoods. The accumulation of a pandemic on top of these everyday hardships, adds another level of uncertainty for their future. These youth need support as they endeavor to finish high school and move onto higher education or entry into the workforce.

The PM Group strongly believes in supporting disadvantaged groups in San Antonio as essential to our moral values and community needs. When we can uplift those dealt a more difficult hand, we know that the entire community will greatly benefit. That is why we were eager to become involved with P.A.M. Media Outreach, an organization that teaches leadership skills to inner-city youth. By empowering teens throughout the inner-city and urban high schools of San Antonio, P.A.M. Media Outreach provides them with the opportunities to learn how they can make a difference and create positive change not only in their high school communities, but the surrounding communities as well. We know these youth become the leaders for tomorrow’s future. The organization is led by Executive Director and Founder Paula A Monroe. 

Becoming a community partner of P.A.M. Media Outreach, means The PM Group will be providing a $15,000 donation for their Leadership Program and Urban Communities Teen Summit so they can purchase laptop computers, camera equipment and other necessary learning supplies. We hope our donation of supplies and funds can help P.A.M. Media Outreach continue to help the Black and Hispanic youth in our community acquire new skills and capabilities to make lasting, positive changes.

You can find out more about P.A.M. Media Outreach at their website.

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency and marketing group. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.content:
The weather is warming up and so is the potential for all the warm weather thrills that Six Flags Fiesta Texas has to offer. You can save up to $30 off of admission if you visit your participating neighborhood IHOP in the San Antonio area and grab a coupon while enjoying your favorite IHOP meal. Coupons are valid now through June 27 and online reservations are required to visit Six Flags Fiesta Texas. Each coupon is good for up to 4 tickets when you visit sixflags.com/fiestatexas.

 

Be sure to dive into one of IHOP’s newest savory menu items – Burritos & Bowls. And when you’re at the park enjoying all the excitement, be sure to hop on the new Dare Devil Dive. So much deliciousness, so much excitement – springtime 2021 is going to be epic!

 

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.title: SAMA Movie Metal – The PM Group San Antonio Advertising Agency

val.content:
You may have seen this new announcement in our latest Making a Difference in San Antonio feature this past Sunday, March 7th in SA INC in the San Antonio Express News. The San Antonio Museum of Art is ringing in their 40th year with an exciting exhibit presented by Generations Federal Credit Union and Spectrum Reach. Movie Metal is an action-packed display of metallic heroes and vehicles from some of Hollywood’s most popular movies and TV shows.

 

On display until April 11th, Movie Metal gives museum attendees the chance to get up close and personal, and even take photos with, their favorite Transformers movie characters like Optimus Prime, The Predator, the Batmobile, and even the DeLorean Time Machine. You can learn more about this exciting exhibit at SAMA’s website to plan your visit.

 

As a San Antonio advertising agency, being a part of the promotion of this exhibit was a win-win. Not only was our family of agencies able to come together to create the marketing, commercials, print ads, in-exhibit signage, and coordinate PR efforts, but we were also able to help create excitement and buzz around a community organization has been fostering the love of art and culture in our city for four decades. The San Antonio Museum of Art allows Texans to see art collections from across the globe, as well as from our own communities, while showing the importance of appreciating just what each and every culture can teach us. After all, art in all of its shapes and forms has the power to bring us together through a joint passion for expressing creativity.

 

San Antonio Museum of Art/Movie Metal Exhibit

Great art can move you, and sometimes great art can actually move. Come see this pop-up exhibition of the epic creatures and vehicles that made the movies, at the San Antonio Museum of Art.
 

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.content:
We have an incredible military history here in San Antonio; one that makes residents proud. For over three centuries, San Antonio has been called home to soldiers and to this day has one of the highest populations of active troops, veterans, and military installations. There’s a reason we’re known as Military City, USA.

Steeped in this rich history are the stories of remarkable individuals and the sacrifices they willingly made for our country. Too often their selflessness gets overlooked and their stories go untold. That’s why Thomas J Henry is presenting Honoring Military City in partnership with the San Antonio Express News. This new platform will be a way that he can continue to make their stories told, to recognize their sacrifices, and show our support for active service members, veterans, graduates, retired, fallen and their families.

Born into a military family overseas while his father was stationed in Germany, Thomas J Henry grew up understanding what it truly meant for a family and soldier to sacrifice their way of living to military service. Once his father retired, and the family moved back to the United States, Mr. Henry was personally driven to continue recognizing and supporting our military and their families.

Honoring Military City is a webpage San Antonians can visit to share the stories of the brave men and women who call our city their home. Thomas J Henry knows well that each one of these stories deserves to be heard, just as each one of these individuals is a vital part of our community. Submitted stories will be gathered and published weekly both online and in the San Antonio Express News printed paper. You can find out more about how to submit your stories here as we all continue to support and uplift the citizens of San Antonio who have served.

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.title: Beyer Plumbing – The PM Group San Antonio Advertising Agency

val.content:
In the advertising agency world, it is always fun and effective to break the mold of traditional TV commercials. Whenever our clients are open to fun and creative new takes on classic, industry-standard themes, we jump into brainstorming mode. Beyer Plumbing wanted to do just that and spread the word about their latest services promotion. So, our creative team here at The PM Group collaborated to create a sweet and furry way to share the news.

 

Animal actors always have a way of tugging at our heartstrings and making us laugh. Remember that sweet yellow lab’s unlikely friendship with a Clydesdale in one of Budweiser’s most memorable Super Bowl ads? Or maybe Bridgestone’s hilarious screaming squirrel commercial? So, when we weaved the commercial storyline of blaming the dog, or cat, or even a parrot for a leaking water heater mess in the house–we went for it!

 

You can watch our latest commercial below and be sure to take advantage of Beyer Plumbing’s latest water heater installation discount. Beyer Plumbing has over 30 years of experience when it comes to any plumbing needs in your home – pet or human caused. We won’t point fingers.

 

Beyer Plumbing “Pets”

 

 

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.title: SA YES Receives Donation from The PM Group | San Antonio Advertising Agency

val.content:
Our entire ad agency staff has a major soft spot in our hearts for all furry friends. That’s why we have such a passion at The PM Group to support organizations who help animals in need. That’s how our relationship with God’s Dogs Rescue began. They have been one of the benefiting organizations at our annual Kings and Queens of Good Hearts Gala over the years, but we wanted to go further and make sure even more San Antonians know about the great work they were doing in our community.

That’s why we chose to feature ‘God’s Dogs Rescue’ in our ‘Making a Difference in San Antonio’ article in SA INC on Valentine’s Day 2021 in the San Antonio Express News. Serving all of South Texas, God’s Dogs rescues & fosters abused, abandoned, and neglected dogs until they can find their ‘furever’ homes. Since 1995, God’s Dogs has been giving dogs a second chance in life in Texas, all over the country, and even in Canada!

“What a wonderful organization! The entire team at God’s Dogs has dedicated their lives to the rescue and well-being of our four-legged friends,” stated PM Group founder and CEO Bob Wills. “We are a very proud supporter of their mission,” he added.  

Are you looking for your next furry family member? Or maybe you and your family are wanting to become fosters to help organizations like God’s Dogs continue to have the helpful resources to find dogs their forever homes. Visit God’s Dogs website to learn more about how you can get involved and check out the latest ‘Making a Difference in San Antonio’ feature.

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years now, the company has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set best ever annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years!  In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.title: San Antonio Sports Receives Donation from The PM Group | San Antonio Advertising Agency

val.content:
Thank you never feels like enough when we can make such a positive impact on community nonprofits like what we have been able to do already this year!  

Here at The PM Group offices, we presented San Antonio Sports and SA YES with the funds we raised to help them continue their missions in our community. Both organizations work hard to support youth in San Antonio with needed school supplies for kids to be productive in school and teaching them empowering and foundational lessons through the power of sport.

The funds were raised at a January 16th Charity Texas Hold’em Poker Tournament benefitting both organizations.

“We are so thankful for the amazing financial support we receive annually from The PM Group’s incredible fundraising efforts,” stated San Antonio Sports CEO, Russ Bookbinder.

“Our San Antonio-based advertising agency team raised over $1,050,000 in support of area nonprofits that needed our help in 2020. Hopefully, we can top that number in 2021,” stated The PM Group’s President, Fran Yanity. In addition to San Antonio, the advertising agency has satellite offices in Arizona, Virginia, and Massachusetts.      

More to Come in 2021

The PM Group will be hosting several additional Charity Texas Hold’em Poker Tournaments throughout 2021 and you can help us support local nonprofits. You can register now for the next tournament, the Final Five Charity Poker Showdown, which will be held on Saturday April 3, 2021 at the Crown Ridge Banquet Hall. Visit texasholdemsa.com to learn more.

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients in 2020 and through their ongoing success with our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala every year —that to date– has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.title: The PM Group – San Antonio Advertising Agency – San Antonio Sports – San Antonio Express News

val.content:
Charitable and community giving has always been a part of who we are as a San Antonio-based advertising agency. Every year, we strive to make a difference by giving back to those in need. We creatively find ways of giving back through the fundraising events we create, host, and by donating money to these worthy causes. “In 2020 alone, our advertising agency was able to give over $1,000,000.00 to local nonprofits,” stated PM Group President / COO Fran Yanity.

For 2021, The PM Group created a new way to help nonprofits in our community. The agency is sponsoring a new print feature in SA INC on 16 different Sundays in the San Antonio Express News called ‘Making a Difference in San Antonio’. This new feature will highlight various different nonprofits and organizations in our community who support childhood education, our military veterans, pet rescue, the arts, and so many more. We hope that by spreading the word about how these organizations uplift our community, more of our community will individually help them make a difference. ‘We’re continuing to raise the bar,” added Yanity.

We are excited to share that our first feature was published Sunday, January 24th and it highlighted the important work that San Antonio Sports does for elementary age students in San Antonio. By encouraging the love of sports, they learn the important link between a healthy body and a healthy mind.

San Antonio Sports offers programs that reach beyond just the students enrolled in their i play! afterschool program – they also offer programs that reach out into the community and help families and individuals feel inspired to live a healthy lifestyle through programs like the Fit Family Challenge and the Alpha Warrior 12-week Fitness Challenge.

President and CEO of San Antonio Sports, Russ Bookbinder shared his thoughts about this new feature, “The most important thing for any non-profit is the public’s awareness and clear understanding of the benefits and services they deliver to make our community stronger. Through the PM Group’s generosity and vision, San Antonio Sports had a significant platform to tell our story to the readers of the San Antonio Express-News. We were thrilled to have this opportunity!”

San Antonio Sports has spent the last 37 years inspiring the community of San Antonio to live healthy and active lives and the PM Group is proud to feature them as our first nonprofit making a difference in SA. To see the full article, visit this link.

All throughout 2021 on select Sundays, the San Antonio Express News SA INC will be telling the story of more nonprofits Making a Difference in San Antonio!  Our next feature will be February 14th sharing the great pet rescue work God’s Dogs does.

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.title: Image-1.28.21-Betty-Kelso-Blog

val.content:
Nestled within the San Antonio Botanical Gardens, the Betty Kelso Center is the perfect place to schedule your next event and be surrounded by the beautiful 38-acre urban oasis near downtown San Antonio. The new event center for the Botanical Gardens is named after late philanthropist Betty Stieren Kelso and was a beautiful way to celebrate the 40th anniversary of the Garden.

The agency is promoting this new event space with a print campaign in several different city magazines and newspaper outlets in conjunction with the digital and social efforts of our sister agency, Noisy Trumpet. Together these campaigns showcase the new 3,500 square foot, LEED Gold-certified indoor/outdoor state-of-the-art event center and how they are set up to provide a safe environment for events even during these challenging, COVID-19 times. The Garden is also offering a wonderful promotion, 25% their venue rental plus one free add-on, if you book your 2021 event on or before February 28, 2021.

Since we are such big fans of the beautiful grounds at the San Antonio Botanical Gardens, we were excited to help promote their new offerings for the community to be able to enjoy one of the most beautiful spaces in San Antonio.

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.title: Image-1.19.21-Tony-Parker-Poker-Tournament-1

val.content:
Tony Parker, a 4-time NBA champion with the San Antonio Spurs has added another championship to his resume with his victory in the Big Game Poker Tournament Saturday January 16th. Tony beat 218 other talented poker players to win the title in this charitable event.

Tony took down the top prize of $25,000 but the biggest winners were the two charities that split the $87,500 raised for San Antonio Sports and SA YES.

Tony will return to defend his victory Saturday April 3rd in the FINAL FIVE Poker Showdown that will payout $55,000 to the top five finishers, including the top prize of $25,000.

Starting Monday February 1st, players can sign up for this April poker tournament at www.TexasHoldemSA.com.  Spaces in the tournament are limited on a first come, first served basis.

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profits, real estate and fitness. For two consecutive years now, the Agency has set annual revenue records with the addition of six new clients and through the continued success of our existing clients. Additionally, the agency hosts their annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In 2020 alone, the Agency donated over $1,050,000 to local non-profits. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.title: New COVID Protection Office – The PM Group

val.content:
In the wake of the worldwide COVID pandemic that has required businesses to take many precautionary measures to safeguard their employees, The PM Group announced today it has created new safety protocols that will be led by its newest agency member.

 

It was an exhausting search that took some persuasion to land the perfect candidate according to President & Chief Operating Officer Fran Yanity. ‘Slimer’ needed to be coaxed away from his four decades long residency in New York City terrorizing people there. But with an excellent benefits & compensation plan, we got the perfect man for the job,” Yanity declared.

 

Visitors to the PM Group’s primary offices in San Antonio, will be greeted immediately upon entering their lobby by Chief Protection Officer Slimer and he will provide all guests & staff members with complimentary hand sanitizer.

 

When asked why he gave up his haunting career in New York City, Slimer stated that “the low cost of living in Texas, no state income taxes and San Antonio’s beautiful River Walk,” were very attractive given the poor state of affairs in New York today.

 

CEO & Founder of The PM Group, Bob Wills, stated this; “Slimer is a fictional Ghostbuster’s movie character with a great history and I look forward to eliminating his position as soon as COVID has been defeated.”   

 

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 33 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profit, real estate and fitness. In addition, the agency hosts an annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In the past 10 years, The PM Group has raised both directly and indirectly over $12 million for these charities. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.title: Charity Texas Hold’em Poker Tournament – The PM Group

val.content:
We wanted to kick off our 2021 fundraising with a bang! Or should we say with a royal flush? On January 16th, 2021 The PM Group will be hosting the first Charity Texas Hold’em Poker Tournament of the year. This tournament will be benefiting San Antonio Sports, SA YES, CC YES, and Austin YES; but these nonprofits aren’t the only ones who will be walking away with cash. If you play your way to one of our two final tables you could win the top prize of $25,000!

 

You can visit texasholdemsa.com to register now with early bird pricing of $350 or value pack pricing of $1,200 for four players. The event will be held at the Crown Ridge Banquet Hall with registration beginning at 9:00am and the tournament beginning at 10:30. Your ticket includes food and beverages all day, compliments of Black Tie Affairs Catering. Top 18 place prizes include various American Express Gift Cards and top finishers will receive $10,000 entries to the 2021 WSOP. In total there will be over $60,000 in combined tournament prizes!

 
 

None of this could be possible without our sponsors so thank you to:

 
 

Who’s ready to play poker? We can’t wait to see you on the 16th to help raise money for our benefiting charities and see you win big!

 

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 32 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profit, real estate and fitness. In addition, the agency hosts an annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In the past 10 years, The PM Group has raised both directly and indirectly over $12 million for these charities. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.title: Image-12.16.20-Alamo-Fireworks-New-Years

val.content:
2020 is almost behind us and Alamo Fireworks is THE place to stock up on fireworks to light up New Year’s Eve and celebrate a hopeful 2021. Despite a pandemic, Alamo Fireworks had a booming Fourth of July season with record-breaking sales and anticipates an even more lit New Year’s Eve. They are opening four new Megastores in San Antonio this winter, one right at their headquarters off Hwy 87/Rigsby road. This won’t be just any Megastore; this will be the largest indoor fireworks store in Central & South Texas with over 30,000sqft – offering more inventory than ever before! With all of this success, they also have their sights set on opening multiple new Megastores in Dallas in 2021 – bringing even more poppin’ possibilities throughout the state of Texas.

 

This year was a challenge for a lot of companies, but it offered Alamo Fireworks the opportunity to launch innovative ways to interact with their customers for easier service. In June, they launched the first ever Alamo-To-Go curbside pickup program with contactless service. Customers can order fireworks online, skip the lines and protect themselves during the pandemic by limiting the amount of person-to-person contact.

 

A family-owned retail and wholesale fireworks company since 1962, Alamo Fireworks promises to deliver 100% happy memories guaranteed. With decades of experience under their belt, they carry one of the largest assortments of fireworks with their own branded inventory like the new Shelter in Place and the Social Distancer. Housed in over 175 locations and 31 Megastores in three states, Alamo Fireworks has everything you need to spark a good time. Plus, each Megastore has their own Alamo Fireworks Certified Expert, who knows all the sizzlin’ details to help you find the perfect boom in no time! Don’t miss their crackin’ deals and early bird pricing on select products or join the Big Spender Club to get more bang for your buck – there is something for everyone! Keep an eye out and be sure to snap a pic with the Alamo Fireworks’ firetruck as it makes its rounds during the season.

 

As you prepare to ring in the new year, be sure to visit AlamoFireworks.com to find your nearest location and place your Alamo-To-Go online orders for pickup beginning December 20th so you can rest assured that your New Year’s Eve will be lit AF!

 

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 32 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profit, real estate and fitness. In addition, the agency hosts an annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In the past 10 years, The PM Group has raised both directly and indirectly over $12 million for these charities. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

val.content:
In conjunction with The PM Group’s 32rd business anniversary, our agency raised a total of $215,049 in support of eight local nonprofits as a result of our annual Kings and Queens of Good Hearts Fun-raiser, which took place September 14-30, 2020.  In comparison to previous years, the fundraising initiative went virtual in the form of an online auction and raffle.

 

All proceeds from the online auction and raffle benefited local charities serving education, at-risk children, military, family support services, as well as pet rescue efforts. This year’s benefiting organizations included:

  • Central Catholic High School
  • God’s Dogs Rescue
  • Guide Dogs of Texas
  • Respite Care of San Antonio        
  •  SA YES
  • The Children’s Shelter
  • Soldiers’ Angels
  • San Antonio Sports
 

“Over the past 30 years, The PM Group has been fortunate enough to endure industry changes by adapting and developing innovative business models to better serve our clients and community,” said The PM Group Founder Bob Wills. “As a result, each year we show our gratitude by supporting nonprofit organizations making a difference in our city – this year was no different. We pivoted and tailored our annual Kings and Queens of Good Hearts Fun-raiser to the current climate, which yielded successful results. Thank you to our sponsors and donors who participated in our annual charitable initiative.”

 
 

About The PM Group: The PM Group was founded in 1988. For over 32 years, the agency has continued to grow and is San Antonio’s largest advertising agency. The PM Group’s client roster spans numerous industries including automotive, CPG, entertainment and sports marketing, legal, business services, non-profit, real estate and fitness. In addition, the agency hosts an annual Charity Gala that to date has raised millions of dollars for local San Antonio area non-profit organizations in the last 15 years! In the past 10 years, The PM Group has raised both directly and indirectly over $12 million for these charities. It is our way of giving back to the community that we so humbly serve.

gsaContents.gsaInfo:
The PM Group is South Texas’ premier full-service agency with a complete spectrum of marketing, creative, public relations, media capabilities and communications services all done in-house in San Antonio.

Since 1988, The PM Group has always been a full-service agency. In addition, we chose to fortify ourselves by launching complementary niche, specialty companies all with common management control and ownership to expand specialty services in an effort to minimize client costs in these areas.

• 541-1/541-IRC Advertising Services
  • 541-2/541-2RC Public Relations Services
  • 541-3/541-3RC Web Based Marketing Solutions
  • 541-4B/541-4BRC Video/Film Production
  • 541-4F/540-4FRC Commercial Art and Graphic Design Services
  • 541-1000/541-1000RC Other Direct Costs (ODCs)
    • 541-1000/RC Digital/Internet Media Buying
    • 541-1000/RC Broadcast TV Media Buying
    • 541-1000/RC Broadcast Radio Media Buying
    • 541-1000/RC Magazine Media Buying
    • 541-1000/RC Newspaper Media Buying
    • 541-1000/RC Out of Home Media Buying
    • 541-1000/RC Theatre Advertising

policyRepeater.sectionContent:
We are the sole owners of the information collected on this site. We only have access to/collect information that you voluntarily give us via email or other direct contact from you. We will not sell or rent this information to any business or individual.

We will use your information to respond to you regarding the reason you contacted us. We will not share your information with any third party outside of our organization, other than as necessary to fulfill your request to get a quote for media and/or advertising services.

You may opt out of any future contacts from us at any time. You can do the following at any time by contacting us via the email address or phone number provided on our website:

  • See what data we have about you, if any.
  • Change/correct any data we have about you.
  • Have us delete any data we have about you.
  • Express any concern you have about our use of your data.
policyRepeater.sectionTitle: Your Access to and Control Over Information

policyRepeater.sectionContent: We share aggregated demographic information with our partners and advertisers. This is not linked to any personal information that can identify any individual person.
We take precautions to protect your information. When you submit information via the website, your information is protected both online and offline.

We use “cookies” on this site. A cookie is a piece of data stored on a site visitor’s hard drive to help us improve your access to our site and identify repeat visitors to our site. For instance, when we use a cookie to identify you, you would not have to log in a password more than once, thereby saving time while on our site. Cookies can also enable us to track and target the interests of our users to enhance their experience on our site. Usage of a cookie is in no way linked to any personally identifiable information on our site.

Some of our business partners may use cookies on our site (e.g., Google). However, we have no access to or control over these cookies.

This web site contains links to other sites. Please be aware that we are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of such other sites. We encourage our users to be aware when they leave our site and to read the privacy statements of any other site that collects personally identifiable information.

If you feel that we are not abiding by this privacy policy, you should contact us immediately via telephone at 210-490-2554 or via email at fran.yanity@thepmgrp.com.

PrivacyFields.policyDescription: This privacy notice discloses the privacy practices for the The PM Group and our website https://thepmgrp.com/. This privacy policy notices applies solely to information collected by this website, except where stated otherwise.

seo.title: Privacy Policy | The PM Group

gridContent.mbContent: Media buying is the process of purchasing media placements for advertising on radio, broadcast TV, cable advertising, billboards, magazines, digital advertising, or other print publications. It’s a common service among advertising and marketing agencies. The primary goal of media buying is getting maximum exposure to as many people at the lowest cost possible. This is the major point of difference with The PM Group’s media department. Everyone wants our prices!

Media buying expertise. The PM Group’s media buyers are always on top of the latest trends in the industry. They have also been around long enough to know what works and what doesn’t work best. With your business goals in mind, we are, therefore, able to provide you with the best path to follow to grow your business. The other benefit is our leverage and buying networks, which The PM Group has established over the last 30 years, giving us trust and buying power.
gridContent.mbTitle: Why is professional media buying necessary?

gridContent.mbContent:
For a better flow in the media buying process, let’s define who a media buyer is.

This is the individual responsible for the negotiation and placement of your ads on television, radio, digital, and print or any other advertising medium.

Digital media buying simply means the process of acquiring display and video ad placements on apps, websites, and other digital platforms.

From geo-fencing to retargeting, from paid serial to programmatic buying, Connected TV and more, The PM Group can deliver best in class placements at the lowest cost available with full reporting capabilities to ensure your marketing dollars have performed as planned.
gridContent.mbTitle: How does digital media buying work?

gridContent.mbContent:
The three phases of media buying at The PM Group include:

  • Pre-launch: Strategizing on vital media decisions
  • Launch: Ensuring media delivery is effective and runs as per the plan
  • Post-launch: Auditing and measuring campaign results, and making any necessary adjustments for maximum benefits
gridContent.mbTitle: The process of media planning and buying

gridContent.mbContent:
Media planning is essential in any marketing decision. This helps identify all the resources required and evaluate available options in an effort to maximize any client’s investment and results.

This reduces the risk of failure of any media campaign.

When The PM Group does media buying, we find it is always best to take time to lay out all the aspects that will go into the campaign to avoid any client disappointments. That is a primary reason our clients stay with us for decades versus just a couple of years. The PM Group focuses on client results, NOT the pursuit of new clients to replace the ones we anticipate losing. How crazy is that? Happy, satisfied clients don’t leave a successful relationship with their advertising agency.

Advertising is only useful when it reaches the right audience. Poor research on who your primary target audience should be will lead to poor media planning & poor media buying and, subsequently, poor results.

Here are the key questions we want all of The PM Group’s clients to the able answer when choosing their target audience:

  • Who do you want your message to reach?
  • Who is your primary target?
  • What is their gender?
  • How old are they?
  • How much income do they earn?
  • Where do they specifically reside?
  • Where do they work–what is their profession?
  • Are they married, engaged, single?
  • Does the desired target have certain education attainment levels?

Once you identify the consumer group you are targeting, we like to master their behavioral traits. This will help us in determining where to place your ad dollars most effectively. If you do not have adequate funds in our professional opinion to launch an effective campaign, we will tell you so. If your budget is inadequate, we won’t spend client money if it is destined to fail. That’s the level of experience and integrity The PM Group brings to the table for our clients.

Our media buying professionals perform research to know exactly what successful methods your competitor is using. The following insight about your competition can help you answer this question comprehensively:

  • Who is your primary competition targeting?
  • What media sources are they buying?
  • In what programs are they running their campaigns?
  • What dayparts are they placing their ads?

These answers will help us create media buys that will allow your business to compete favorably in the market.
gridContent.mbTitle: What is your competitor up to?

gridContent.mbContent: Based on your industry knowledge on who your primary target audience is, where we can find them, and having a defined understanding of your key competitors’ marketing moves–The PM Group media team can come up with a winning strategy for our clients. It’s what we have done successfully for over 30 years and we are still the marketing and advertising leader in our space.

This is an area that our marketing and advertising agency competitors cannot measure up to our stringent media buying standards. We are the only San Antonio area advertising agency that guarantees their clients two specific key differences: the combination of the lowest prices and a 100% or greater audience delivery.

If you went to the supermarket and bought 4 bags of groceries and they only put 3 bags in your car, wouldn’t you demand you receive the missing groceries? That is what happens when a media buying agency does not 100% guarantee their media performance for their clients!

textImageSection.textAboutDescription:
With all the media choices available to advertisers, it can be hard to choose the right one. For starters, many clients/advertisers quite honestly don’t have the ability to garner the lowest prices. The primary goal of media buying is getting maximum exposure to the most people at the lowest cost possible.

That is where The PM Group media buying professionals come in. We purchase more media in the San Antonio market than any ten agencies combined! That media power assures The PM Group clients they get the best rates available. Even our smallest clients enjoy the same rates as our multi-million-dollar clients receive. That’s unmatched buying power!
textImageSection.textAboutTitle: NO ONE BUYS MORE MEDIA IN SOUTH TEXAS THAN THE PM GROUP, SAN ANTONIO'S LARGEST ADVERTISING AND MARKETING AGENCY.

seo.title: Work | The PM Group

about.content:
We often say that our best work is in the community.

Giving back to the community is an integral part of our PMG work culture. Some of our direct nonprofit partners include Brighton Center, SA YES, Soldiers’ Angels, San Antonio Sports and Robin Hood 210. That’s why we created a yearly charity fundraiser called “The Kings and Queens of Good Hearts Charity Gala” to help fund South Texas charities and local nonprofits.

In 2019, the gala raised over $470,000, benefiting children, animal rescue, education, veterans, and more.
about.title: Over the past 10 years, the PM Group has raised and donated over $12,000,000 to local nonprofits.

charityList.name: Boys and Girls Club of San Antonio
Cold Days, Warm Hearts Winter Coat Project
Texas Scottish Rite Hospital for Children
UT Health Science Center San Antonio

seo.title: Community | The PM Group

items.description: The PM Group collaborates with our affiliated companies to provide better, faster, and cost-effective results for our clients. Each company is a market leader in their respective field, with expert leadership and dedicated staff.
items.name: THE PM GROUP’S AFFILIATED COMPANIES

items.description: Noisy Trumpet is an integrated digital marketing and public relations agency with a commitment to staying abreast of industry trends. We help clients identify new and relevant opportunities to engage and connect with their customers with digital marketing and advertising, website development, social media management, and public relations.
items.name: NOISY TRUMPET

items.description: Quarter Moon Productions is a full-service television production studio specializing in TV commercials, broadcast show production, and live production. QMP opened its doors in October 2010 and produces hundreds of television commercials each year. QMP also produces independent TV shows and live sports show that air all across Texas in over 15 DMA’s.
items.name: QUARTER MOON PRODUCTIONS

items.description: PMX Events produces Celebrity Fan Fest, San Antonio’s Premier Pop Culture & Comic Con. Celebrity Fan Fest features the best A-List Hollywood Stars and celebrities, comic creators, illustrators, and artists. In addition, PMX Events produces Hollywood Car Show.
items.name: PMX EVENTS

items.description: This company produces and sells the #1 consumer savings book in South Texas with its “Book of Free” product. Nnovative Marketing Solutions brings together both consumer and merchant with its innovative approach to consumer marketing.
items.name: NNOVATIVE MARKETING SOLUTIONS

items.description: Our Hollywood Car collection has the most famous movie and television cars for rent for all occasions. Whether it’s a grand opening, company event, charity, commercial, or a wedding – we have an amazing selection of cars to wow your family, friends, or guests.
items.name: CARS AS STARS RENTALS

items.description: CSAV delivers outstanding, professional AV to your audience, without problems or surprises. CSAV handles projects of all sizes in all locations across the United States including In-Person Events, Virtual Events, Hybrid Events, Live, and On-Demand.
items.name: CONVENTION SERVICES AV

seo.title: Companies | The PM Group

capabilityCard.cardBody: Our experience in the sports and entertainment industry has allowed us to represent many industry leaders, including Six Flags Fiesta Texas, All American Bowl Game, San Antonio Spurs, San Antonio Rampage and Santikos Entertainment.

The PM Group has 30+ years of restaurant experience working with national chains like IHOP, Pizza Hut, KFC, and Taco Bell, regional chains like Cotton Patch Café, and local favorites like Rudy’s BBQ, La Fogata, and Silo Elevated Cuisine. Whether you are in the process of opening a restaurant or seeking to grow an existing business, we can help you convince people you are the place to eat at!

We work with many B2B clients from the technology sector and government agencies on branding, campaigns, and projects.

Download our GSA Statement here.

The leadership team at The PM Group will work your team to develop effective marketing materials to help articulate your firm’s unique skill sets and turn your messaging into a competitive advantage. Then, we provide unsurpassed media buying clout to get the word out!

Our nonprofit work is the work that is closest to our hearts. We have helped many nonprofit organizations – of all sizes – identify and navigate the marketing challenges associated with nonprofits. We develop, design, and implement marketing strategies that increase value for your organization through branding, community engagement, lead acquisition, data analysis, and more.

One more thing…in the past 10 years, we have personally raised over $12,000,000 for local charities through our own company-funded initiatives to make our community a better place.

New technologies have made the buying journey more complex for marketers. We explore every step of the customer journey to help craft a consistent, compelling marketing strategy designed to increase your customer acquisition and retention.

client.name: Boys and Girls Clubs of SA
The Law Offices of Thomas J. Henry

seo.title: Expertise | The PM Group

aboutEntry.content: Getting results is what matters most to us. We don’t have big artistic egos or like to waste time or money (yours or ours)! We’re here to make things happen. That’s why clients stay with us for decades.
aboutEntry.title: Our Approach

aboutEntry.content: We are flexible and we love what we do! We have both small project clients and contract clients with extensive marketing needs. We love them both.
aboutEntry.title: We Love Clients Big and Small

aboutEntry.content: The PM Group is the largest buyer of media in our region, with unsurpassed media strength, experience and resources. It’s funny how our competitors often ask the media for ‘The PM Group’ rates… only to be greatly disappointed that those rates aren’t available to agencies (and their clients) that don’t have the collective buying power of our agency.
aboutEntry.title: Media Clout

aboutEntry.content: You don’t become (and stay) the #1 advertising agency in San Antonio/South Texas for the last 20 years without a long history of client success. Ask us and we will share why clients stay with us so long when the industry average is just 4.5 years.
aboutEntry.title: Our Track Record

aboutEntry.content: Our in-house staff (NOT freelancers) from The PM Group and our constellation of companies allow us to control costs, hit deadlines and deliver high-level production values.
aboutEntry.title: Streamlined In-House Production

aboutHero.aboutTitle: What Makes The PM Group Different?

val.content:
This is an example page. It’s different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I’m a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin’ caught in the rain.)

…or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

seo.title: PMG.Header.Image_.Clean_-1 | The PM Group

about.content:
The PM Group is a San Antonio-based advertising agency that is at the hub of a group of companies under the same ownership.

Each company has its own defined specialty of marketing services. Together, we bring our skills, strengths, and resources to help our clients.

By sharing information and resources within our constellation of companies, we can work smarter, FASTER, and more cost-efficiently.
about.title: FULL-SERVICE MARKETING

aboutSection.content:
The PM Group is a San Antonio-based advertising agency that is at the hub of a group of companies under the same ownership. 

Each company has its own defined specialty of marketing services. Together, we bring our skills, strengths, and resources to help our clients.

By sharing information and resources within our constellation of companies, we can work smarter, FASTER, and more cost-efficiently.
aboutSection.title: FULL-SERVICE MARKETING

contactSection.body: We love helping businesses by creating individualized marketing plans that will help them reach their goals. Contact us today to see what we can do for you.
contactSection.name: Fran Yanity
contactSection.title: Get In Touch To Learn More

homeFields.headline: San Antonio’s Largest Advertising and Marketing Agency

heroImages.title: WHAT MAKES THE PM GROUP DIFFERENT?

howWeGotHere.content:
The PM Group was started in 1988, and we have been the largest media buyer in our region for the last 20 years. As media and technology have dramatically changed, The PM Group has transformed and continues to reinvent ourselves every 5-7 years. That’s how you stay on top and retain clients for decades!

Today, we are a focused group of affiliated companies, offering a complete range of marketing services.
howWeGotHere.title: HOW WE GOT HERE.

secondaryCta.title: SHARED KNOWLEDGE. SHARED RESOURCES. SHARED SUCCESS.

serviceEntry.content: The PM Group is the largest advertising agency in San Antonio, offering marketing, branding, and creative services. We are also the largest buyer of media in San Antonio and South Texas, with unsurpassed media clout in television, radio, outdoor, digital and print advertising.
serviceEntry.title: Traditional Advertising

serviceEntry.content: We create effective digital marketing strategies and solutions for our clients including online media plans, SEO, social media plans, and websites.
serviceEntry.title: Digital Marketing

serviceEntry.content: The PM Group has an award-winning creative team, in house, who can craft the right expression for your brand in any media. You don’t stay on-top for 32+ years unless you are getting your clients the results they expect!
serviceEntry.title: Creative

serviceEntry.content: Quarter Moon Productions is our full-service production studio, with state-of-the-art equipment, staffed with talented editors, producers, motion graphic artists and directors. We create television & radio commercials, tv shows, and brand videos for our clients.
serviceEntry.title: Video Content Creation

serviceEntry.content: In just three short years, Noisy Trumpet Digital & Public Relations became the second largest PR firm in South Texas! Hard work plus great, talented staffers have lead the firm to receive numerous national awards & recognition!
serviceEntry.title: Public Relations

serviceEntry.content: The PM Group is a national leader in philanthropic and special event marketing. Be it Child Abuse Prevention Month campaigns, pop culture events like Celebrity Fan Fest, The King & Queen of Good Hearts Gala, Charitable Poker Tournaments, Charitable Golf Tournaments and High School Football bowl games. In addition, we partner with national and local brands on sales growth promotions for clients that puts smiles on the faces of our clients!
serviceEntry.title: Events, Promos and Fundraisers
